name: Stylesmooth Theme for Cpanel and DA
short_description: Style Smooth enhances the look of your default CPanel or DirectAdmin installation by replacing those tired dull tones with a brand spanking new interface complete with a shiny silver finish, electric blue highlights and smooth rollovers.
